CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Persistent notification
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: The notification persists until it is explicitly dismissed.
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: The notification is dismissed automatically when playback stops.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Restart playback
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: If the network connection is lost during playback and then re-established within five minutes, then playback is restarted
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: If the network connection is lost during playback, then playback is stopped.
